direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return a static value (NAME and data length) without modifying the state.
Both methods provide information about the attribute, one about the name and the other about the count of attributes.
Both methods involve operations related to attributes and their representation.

enhanced_by.reason: Adding attributes can set up the state for getName to return the correct attribute name.
Encoding the attribute can be a prerequisite step before verifying the name.
Comparing attributes can help verify the correctness of the getName method.
